name: BountyRain
description:
Control

Move - Arrow Keys or WASD

Toggle Speed and Power - Space

Add Chest - Press 1

Mission

You have 150 Seconds to fill your boxes with money. Dimes will automatically fill the box to 500 while with coins you can fill them only until 100. 

Try to achieve as many dimes possible.
